item.title: [525] Object Clipping [525]
item.dc:creator: @1800getk0ed 1800getk0ed
item.description:
@1800getk0ed wrote:

Alright, I’ve added a static rc altar at home, so when you click the altar, you get 10k xp in rc and it’ll give you 25k cash. As my server is a pk spawnconomy it brings money in for new players. BUT, there is a problem with the thieving and rc objects. you must stand in a certain tileto use these but I find it highly annoying as other players might not know and they think its broken. Lol.

This is how my rc works although its irrelevant to this fix I coded it myself(: pretty happy.

case 2488:
p.requestAnim(791, 0);
p.requestGFX(186, 0);
p.clickDelay = 4;
if (p.skillLvl[20] <= 1) { 
p.appendExperience(1000, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 5000);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You receive 1,000 runecrafting xp and 5,000 coins.");
}
else if (p.skillLvl[20] <= 25) {
p.appendExperience(5000, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 10000); 
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You receive 5,000 runecrafting xp and 10,000 coins."); 
}
else if (p.skillLvl[20] <= 50) { 
p.appendExperience(7500, 20); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 25000); 
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You receive 7,500 runecrafting xp and 25,000 coins.");
} 
else if (p.skillLvl[20] <= 75) { 
p.appendExperience(15000, 20);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 50000); 
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You receive 15,000 runecrafting xp and 50,000 coins.");
} 
else if (p.skillLvl[20] == 99) { 
p.appendExperience(25000, 20); 
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 75000); 
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You receive 25,000 runecrafting xp and 75,000 coins");
}
break;

Read full topic
